author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Warhammer: Age of Sigmar has a suspiciously Old World-shaped hole to fill ever since the end of Warhammer Fantasy. Instead of treading old ground, Age of Sigmar focused on high fantasy elements. Naturally, that meant every faction needed an equally fantastical update. Even factions as grisly as the Flesh-eater Courts and the Nighthaunt.

Continue reading The Flesh-eater Courts and Nighthaunt factions come stalking in this AoS preview
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer Age of Sigmar armies guide, Age of Sigmar Kharadron Overlords guide, Age of Sigmar Stormcast Eternals guide
title: The Flesh-eater Courts and Nighthaunt factions come stalking in this AoS preview

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Asian-inspired TTRPGs have a rocky history for me. As an Asian, I’ve had to deal with the fact that most Western developers assume Asia is nothing more than the East, hence the propensity for ninjas, samurai, and other “honorable” clichés. Fortunately, the modern era has amazing games inspired by Asia, helped along by consultants and authors from that very continent.

Continue reading These three Asian inspired tabletop RPGs and board games get it RIGHT
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: These three Asian inspired tabletop RPGs and board games get it RIGHT

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
The Witcher is one of the most beloved European fantasy series in modern times, thanks in large part to its excellent adaptations. The novels were fantastic already, as any veteran longtimer fan can tell you. But there’s no denying the video games and Netflix series breathed new life into the decades-old franchise.  Now, experience yet another adaptation with The Witcher TTRPG, for a fantastical 91% off on Humble Bundle.

Continue reading Toss a coin to your Witcher with this incredible TTRPG Bundle for 91% off!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Get monthly free games with Humble Choice, Check out the latest Humble Bundles, Browse ongoing Humble sales
title: Toss a coin to your Witcher with this incredible TTRPG Bundle for 91% off!
